mapper.insert: insert into study_group(user_id, con_nm, sg_name, sg_allnum, sg_start_date, sg_end_date, sg_level, sg_content, sg_status) values (#{user_id}, #{con_nm}, #{sg_name}, #{sg_allnum}, #{sg_start_date}, #{sg_end_date}, #{sg_level}, #{sg_content}, #{sg_status})
insert into join_group(user_id, sg_no, jg_confirm) values(#{user_id}, #{sg_no}, #{jg_confirm});
mapper.select:
select s.*, u.user_nm , ifnull(c.sg_aplynum, 0) as sg_aplynum from study_group s left join user u on s.user_id = u.user_id left join (select count(*) as sg_aplynum, sg_no from join_group where jg_confirm = '승인' group by sg_no) c on s.sg_no = c.sg_no where s.user_id = #{gvo.user_id}
and u.user_nm LIKE concat('%',#{gsvo.user_nm},'%')

select s.*, u.user_nm, ifnull(c.sg_aplynum, 0) as sg_aplynum from study_group s left join user u on s.user_id = u.user_id left join (select count(*) as sg_aplynum, sg_no from join_group where jg_confirm = '승인' group by sg_no) c on s.sg_no = c.sg_no where s.sg_no = #{sg_no}

select j.*, u.user_nm, g.sg_name, ifnull(c.sg_aplynum, 0) as sg_aplynum from join_group j left join user u on j.user_id = u.user_id left join study_group g on g.sg_no = j.sg_no left join (select count(*) as sg_aplynum, sg_no from join_group where jg_confirm = '승인' group by sg_no) c on j.sg_no = c.sg_no
where j.sg_no = #{sg_no} and j.jg_confirm = '승인'
where u.user_nm LIKE concat('%',#{user_nm},'%') and j.jg_confirm = '승인'
